name: Telegram Vocabulary Saver
description: Highlight a word, add its meaning, and send it to a Telegram group.

permission_descriptions.storage: Stores the Telegram bot token and chat ID locally via chrome.storage.sync so the extension can send messages without prompting every time.
permission_descriptions.activeTab: Accesses the currently active tab only after the user interacts with the extension, allowing it to read the selected word and show the popup.

host_permissions_descriptions.https://api.telegram.org/*: Sends the formatted vocabulary entry to Telegram's Bot API using the credentials you provide.
